overview: Short documentary (39 minutes) production by Horizons Media, Inc. Released in January 2021  ï»¿  While much has been made of the potential for psychedelics to improve the lives of those suffering from maladies like depression, addiction, and PTSD, how can they help us face the fears that await all of us at the end of our vital journey?
